about_the_game:
Animal Striker 2 is a fast-paced and fantastical multiplayer FPS where animals face off in intense battles using magical and unique weapons. Instead of special abilities, players pick up weapons scattered across the arenas, each with amazing visual effects and devastating powers. The game offers a quick, action-packed combat experience with various game modes, ranging from Free-for-All to team-based matches like Capture the Flag and Defuse the Bomb.

Players can customize their loadouts and appearance, unlocking new items as they progress, ensuring each match feels fresh and strategic. Animal Striker 2 stands out from traditional shooters by delivering a fun, colorful aesthetic focused on providing dynamic, effect-filled gameplay.

Key Features:

  • Fast-paced, action-packed multiplayer battles.

  • A variety of game modes, including Free-for-All, Capture the Flag, and Defuse the Bomb.

  • Magical weapons with unique projectiles and special visual effects.

  • Customizable loadouts and skins for your characters.

  • Vibrant environments and arenas designed for strategic and chaotic action.

  • Constant updates with new content, modes, and characters.

Get ready to dominate the battlefield with your magical arsenal and unleash the power of your fantastic projectiles in Animal Striker 2!

name: Animal Striker 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Animal Striker 2 is a fast-paced multiplayer FPS where animals fight in intense arenas. Pick up magical weapons with unique projectiles, customize your loadout, and compete in team-based or free-for-all modes. Unleash your power and dominate the battlefield!
